    • Uses of Task in org.tantalum

      Subclasses of Task in org.tantalum 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncTask
      An implementation of Android's AsyncTask pattern for cross platform application on JME and Android.
      Methods in org.tantalum that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Task.chain(Task nextTask)
      Set a Task which will fork()ed after the current Task completes.
      Task Task.fork()
      Execute this task asynchronously on a Worker thread.
      Task Task.fork(int priority)
      Execute this task asynchronously on a Worker thread at the specified priority.
      Task Task.setShutdownBehaviour(int shutdownBehaviour)
      Override the default shutdown behavior If for example you want an ongoing task to finish if it has already started when the shutdown signal comes, but be removed from the queue if it has not yet started, set to Task.DEQUEUE_ON_SHUTDOWN Note that items passed to Worker.queueShutdownTask() ignore this value and will all run normally to completion during shutdown unless the platform (not the application) initiated the shutdown and slow shutdown Tasks result in a shutdown times-out.
      Methods in org.tantalum with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Task.chain(Task nextTask)
      Set a Task which will fork()ed after the current Task completes.
      static void Task.joinAll(Task[] tasks)
      Wait up to a Task.MAX_TIMEOUT milliseconds for all tasks in the list to complete execution.
      static void Task.joinAll(Task[] tasks, long timeout)
      Wait up to a maximum specified timeout for all tasks in the list to complete execution.

      Subclasses of Task in org.tantalum.net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpGetter
      GET something from a URL on the Worker thread Implement Runnable if you want to automatically update the UI on the EDT after the GET completes

      HTTP POST a message to a given URL

      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_ANYWHERE operation on a Worker thread in the background.
      class  StaticWebCache.GetWebTask
      This Task performs a StaticWebCache.GET_WEB operation on a Worker thread in the background.

      A helper class to get data asynchronously from the local ramCache without attempting to get data from the web.

      Remove all elements from this ramCache
      Task StaticCache.clearHeapCacheAsync(Task chainedTask)
      Note that if the conversion in the DataTypeHandler changes due to application logic requirements, you can at any time use this to force as-needed re-conversion.

      Retrieve an object from RAM or RMS storage.
      Task StaticCache.getKeysAsync(Task chainedTask)
      Get a Vector of all keys for key-value pairs currently in the local ramCache at the flash memory level.
